mapper.select: SELECT ur.user_review_seq AS userReviewSeq, p.project_title AS projectTitle, ur.team_member_review_star AS reviewStar, ur.reg_date AS regDate FROM tbl_user_review ur JOIN tbl_team_member tm ON ur.receive_team_member_seq = tm.team_member_seq JOIN tbl_team t ON tm.team_seq = t.team_seq JOIN tbl_project p ON t.project_seq = p.project_seq
